sequence: <size=51>The storm rages across the waters, through a night that knows no end.</size>
<size=51>Within the tempest lingers one lonesome vessel.</size>
<size=51>Will the storm's rage first be quelled, or will this vessel first capsize?</size>
<size=51>Will a ray of light bring hope through the darkness?</size>
<size=51>For I am but an oneiric butterfly, fluttering among illusions.</size>
<size=51>May light guide this vessel. May hope guide the Sakura Empire.</size>

scripts.say: Sakura Empire - An island within the Diadem of Light
(Clink, clank!)
Aaaah! Ryuuhou, watch out!!
The destroyer, Hibiki, was careening down a flight of stairs, her balance failing her as she struggled to contain an armful of ceremonial items.
(Clang! Bam! Crash!)
She falls over in panic, dropping the ceremonial items all over the place.
Owie...
You're so mean, Ryuuhou! You could've helped me!
Next to her is Ryuuhou, a former submarine tender who had been converted into a light carrier. She effortlessly avoided the destroyer, catching the ceremonial items in mid-air.
Don't whine to me. We shipgirls don't get hurt so easily. And didn't I tell you to be careful with these ceremonial items?
Hey, can't you show at least a little concern for me?
We're nearly ready to begin the ritual, so please do tread with a little more care from now on.
...Speaking of the ritual, will you-know-who really be there?
Any and all from the Sakura Empire will surely come.

Remember what she said? "Let us hold a historic ceremony and make an offering to the gods. It shall show the Sakura Empire the way forward, giving unto it a brighter future free of threats from the likes of foreign nations or the Sirens."
So this is where you were, Ryuuhou.
Ah, Noshiro. Good to see you. Do you need something?
I'm here to forward the message from our Iron Blood guests: "We will participate in the ritual." Or so they said, but they seem to have gotten lost.
In other words... this is the first time we'll be holding a ritual with outsiders present.
Noshiro, would you please escort them here?
...Certainly. I will do so at once.

However, I need you to do something, Ryuuhou. An offering in which the ships participating in the ritual compete for glory – a Combined Fleet exercise – is necessary as a display of the Sakura Empire's strength.
I would like you to prepare the event for the participants, as well as decide on how to conduct the matches.
Very well. Organizing events is not my forte, but I will focus all my attention on it.
*knock* *knock*
Ryuuhou, Akagi's crew are about to arrive any minute now.
The First Carrier Division! I knew they'd come!
It is time to make our move, Ryuuhou.
...Yes, of course.
This ritual will decide the future of the Sakura Empire.
As representatives of our great land, we must not fail!
Now, everyone, get into your respective positions!
Understood!
After years of suffering... No, we've been training for this very moment, and it is time to show the entire world our might!
The venue bursts with activity as everyone begins getting into the positions they've been assigned.

sequence: <size=60>                                 The Sakura Empire's oceans are enveloped in the zeal to carry out the ritual.</size>
